content.raw:
I got a problem when trying to use gazebo with ros. 

Try to launch with command

```
roslaunch gazebo_ros empty_world.launch
```

Got an error

```
Aborted (core dumped)
[gazebo_gui-3] process has died [pid 21133, exit code 134, cmd /opt/ros/melodic/lib/gazebo_ros/gzclient __name:=gazebo_gui __log:=/home/eko_rudiawan/.ros/log/a75091fe-374a-11ea-8849-94b86d292534/gazebo_gui-3.log].
log file: /home/eko_rudiawan/.ros/log/a75091fe-374a-11ea-8849-94b86d292534/gazebo_gui-3*.log 
```

Try open gazebo via terminal with --verbose

```
gazebo --verbose
```

Result

```
[Msg] Waiting for master.
[Msg] Waiting for master.
[Msg] Connected to gazebo master @ http://127.0.0.1:11345
[Msg] Publicized address: 192.168.0.102
[Msg] Connected to gazebo master @ http://127.0.0.1:11345
[Msg] Publicized address: 192.168.0.102
[Err] [GuiIface.cc:124] Cannot mix incompatible Qt library (version 0x50905) with this library (version 0x50c05)
```

But It is normal when opening Gazebo via OS menu
content.html:
I got a problem when trying to use gazebo with ros.

Try to launch with command

roslaunch gazebo_ros empty_world.launch

Got an error

Aborted (core dumped)
[gazebo_gui-3] process has died [pid 21133, exit code 134, cmd /opt/ros/melodic/lib/gazebo_ros/gzclient __name:=gazebo_gui __log:=/home/eko_rudiawan/.ros/log/a75091fe-374a-11ea-8849-94b86d292534/gazebo_gui-3.log].
log file: /home/eko_rudiawan/.ros/log/a75091fe-374a-11ea-8849-94b86d292534/gazebo_gui-3*.log

Try open gazebo via terminal with --verbose

gazebo --verbose

Result

[Msg] Waiting for master.
[Msg] Waiting for master.
[Msg] Connected to gazebo master @ http://127.0.0.1:11345
[Msg] Publicized address: 192.168.0.102
[Msg] Connected to gazebo master @ http://127.0.0.1:11345
[Msg] Publicized address: 192.168.0.102
[Err] [GuiIface.cc:124] Cannot mix incompatible Qt library (version 0x50905) with this library (version 0x50c05)

But It is normal when opening Gazebo via OS menu
